meta.homeTitle: Melody Mind - The Ultimate Music Quiz Game
meta.homeDescription: Test your music knowledge in our interactive quiz game. Answer questions about songs, artists, and music history from various genres like rock, pop, hip-hop, and classical.
meta.homeKeywords: Music Quiz, Music Knowledge, Online Quiz, Music History, Artist Quiz, Album Quiz, Music Genres, Interactive Game

category.defaultDescription: Discover various music quiz categories at Melody Mind. Test your knowledge across different genres and eras of music history.

gameRules.title: Game Rules - Melody Mind
gameRules.description: Learn about Melody Mind's game rules. Find out everything about game modes, scoring system, and bonus features in our music quiz.

highscores.title: Leaderboard - Melody Mind
highscores.description: View the high scores of the best players in all categories. Compare your performance with other music enthusiasts.

game.title: {category} Quiz - {difficulty} Mode
game.description: Play the {category} music quiz in {difficulty} mode! Test your music knowledge and compete for high scores.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Melody Mind
privacy.description: Learn about our privacy policies. Find out how we protect and use your data at Melody Mind.

imprint.title: Imprint - Melody Mind
imprint.description: Legal information and contact details for Melody Mind.

about.title: About Melody Mind
about.description: Test your music knowledge in various categories

seo.description: Test your music knowledge in various categories. An exciting quiz game for music lovers of all genres.

intro: Dive into the fascinating world of music! At Melody Mind, put your music knowledge to the test in exciting quiz rounds. Answer questions about songs from different decades, artists, albums, and music history. Collect points, earn golden records, and challenge other music enthusiasts. From rock to pop to hip-hop and classical - test your knowledge in your favorite genres. Start your musical quiz adventure now!

register.title: Register
register.successMessage: Registration successful! Please check your emails.

error.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters long
error.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
error.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
error.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.successMessage: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.

gameHome.title: Select Your Musical Journey
gameHome.description: Discover the fascinating world of music through different decades and genres

playlist.title: Playlists
playlist.description: Dive into our curated playlist featuring the best {genre} songs

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Would you like to learn more about the history and development of {genre}? Here you'll find fascinating background information and interesting facts.

message.intro: Wow! I scored {points} points in Melody Mind!
message.perfect: INCREDIBLE! Perfect round on {difficulty}! You're a true music expert!
message.gold: Outstanding performance on {difficulty}! Gold LP earned - keep rocking!
message.silver: Awesome job on {difficulty}! Silver LP earned - you're on fire!
message.bronze: Great effort on {difficulty}! Bronze LP earned - silver is within reach!
message.encouragement: Nice start! Keep practicing and you'll rock even harder!

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Welcome to MelodyMind! Your goal is to answer questions about songs, artists, and albums from various music genres. Choose a genre and put your knowledge to the test. The more questions you answer correctly, the more points you'll earn.

difficultyLevels.title: Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.intro: There are three difficulty levels you can choose from:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: 10 questions per round. Perfect for refreshing your knowledge and having fun.

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: 15 questions per round. A challenge for advanced music lovers.

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: 20 questions per round. Only for true music experts!

titles.intro: Each difficulty level has its own title that you can unlock:

novice.title: Music Novice
novice.description: Answered all questions correctly in easy mode.

master.title: Music Master
master.description: Answered all questions correctly in medium mode.

legend.title: Music Legend
legend.description: Answered all questions correctly in hard mode.

goldenRecords.title: Golden Records
goldenRecords.intro: When answering all questions in a category correctly, you'll receive a golden record:

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.text: The ranking system compares you with other players. Placement in the top 10 is based on your collected points across all categories.
lists: Genre-specific ranking: Best players of a genre.
Overall ranking: Best players across all categories.

tipsAndTricks.title: Tips & Tricks
tips: Start in easy mode to get a feel for the game.
Choose your strengths and play the genres you're confident in.
Practice regularly to improve your score.
Accuracy over speed – read each question carefully.

lps.title: Record Collection
lps.none: You haven't collected any records yet

errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long

accessibility.darkMode: Switch between light and dark mode

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.message: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are required for basic site functionality

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show relevant advertising to visitors

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.withdraw: You can withdraw your consent at any time

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.info: We will delete your data within 30 days
deletion.local: Local data in your browser can be deleted through your browser settings.

general.title: General Information
general.text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy informs you about how we handle your data.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible user experience. These do not store any personally identifiable information.

serverLogs.title: Server Logs
serverLogs.text: For technical purposes, we automatically store server logs transmitted by your browser.

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.text: We use anonymous analytics data to improve your gaming experience. This includes game statistics, usage patterns, and performance metrics, without any personally identifiable information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

list.information: Right to information about your stored data
list.correction: Right to correction of incorrect data

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about privacy, you can contact us at any time.

progress.title: Game Progress
progress.intro: The following game data is stored:
progress.purpose: This data is used exclusively to improve your gaming experience and display your achievements.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.intro: The following data is stored locally in your browser:
localStorage.storage: This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers. You can delete it at any time through your browser settings.

session.title: Session Data
session.intro: During an active game session, the following data is temporarily stored:

list.auth: Authentication status for the game session

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.intro: You have the right to have the following data deleted:

list.highscores: Your personal highscores and game statistics
list.account: Your entire user account and all associated data

deletion.local: Locally stored data (cookies, game progress) can be deleted independently through your browser settings.

responsible.title: Responsible for content according to § 55 para. 2 RStV

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS)
disputeResolution.additional: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

lawReference.title: Legal References
lawReference.text: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

jurisdiction.title: Legal Basis
jurisdiction.text: This website is subject to German law. Place of jurisdiction is Germany.
jurisdiction.applicableLaw: German law applies exclusively, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.
jurisdiction.jurisdiction: Place of fulfillment and exclusive place of jurisdiction for all disputes is Germany, as far as legally permissible.

errors.tooShort: Username must be at least 2 characters long
errors.invalidChars: Username may only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
